0-Overview and Quickstart

11/26/2021

Source: vignettes/00_quickstart.Rmd
00_quickstart.Rmd

If you would like an overview of the features and functionality of the browser, please view the Browsing vignette.

The following vignettes are intended to guide curators through the process of creating a web application and formatting data for visualization in the browser. The main vignettes in the series include:

  1. Installation: install required R packages, dependencies and configuration of the nescessary Python environments
  2. Data curation: pre-process, filter, and format -omics data
  3. Configuration: connect the database(s) with the application
  4. Launching and sharing: prepare the browser for sharing with collaborators

An additional vignette on Adding multiple databases is also available.

Please view the examples/ directory of the GitHub repository for this project to view files and scripts for a variety of use cases.

A short installation & configuration tutorial video is also available which roughly follows this sequence of vignettes:

Developed by Andy Henrie.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.2.
